data.name: CustomerBot
data.description: AI customer service agent that handles complex customer inquiries across multiple channels
data.key_features: Natural language understanding, Sentiment analysis, Multi-channel support, CRM integration
data.technology_stack: GPT-4, Custom NLP, React frontend, Python backend

data.name: RetailAssist
data.description: In-store and online shopping assistant that helps customers find products and provides recommendations
data.key_features: Product knowledge base, Personalized recommendations, Inventory integration, Voice interface
data.technology_stack: GPT-4, Vector search, iOS/Android apps, Node.js backend
data.target_customers: Physical retail stores with online presence

data.name: WorkflowGPT
data.description: AI system that orchestrates complex business workflows by coordinating multiple specialized agents
data.key_features: Workflow designer, Multi-agent coordination, API integrations, Audit logging
data.technology_stack: Custom LLM, React dashboard, Python middleware, Enterprise connectors

data.name: Agentive Framework
data.description: Open source framework for building, testing and deploying custom AI agents with advanced reasoning
data.key_features: Agent reasoning engine, Tool use framework, Memory systems, Multi-agent communication
data.pricing: Free open source, enterprise support starting at $5k/month
data.technology_stack: Python, React, Various LLM support, Docker deployment

data.name: TaskCopilot
data.description: AI assistant that helps users manage and complete tasks by integrating with productivity tools
data.key_features: Task prioritization, Email processing, Calendar management, Document drafting
data.technology_stack: GPT-3.5, Chrome extension, SaaS platform, Microsoft 365 integration
